item.title: We do not utter a star man's name
item.summary: Certain names not to be uttered. By /han≠kass’o (L VIII.-23. 8071 rev.). |han≠kass'o's grandfather (Tsatsi) told him that he should never say a star man's name (or a star's man's name).
item.comments: 1) This story is found in Book VIII-23
item.author: |han≠kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
